summary: "The Blacklist" is an American crime show that aired on NBC from 2013 to 2023. It follows Raymond Reddington, a wanted criminal played by James Spader, who helps the FBI catch other dangerous criminals. The series was created by Jon Bokenkamp and had a successful run, winning an Emmy and getting nominated for many other awards. It also led to a spin-off show, video games, and books. The story revolves around Reddington's mysterious past and his unique list of criminals, known as the "Blacklist."
title: The Blacklist
